allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix library overlay to resolve /lib symlink conflict and missing vectors.so

This fix resolves two critical issues:
- Docker mod copy error: "cannot overwrite non-directory '/lib' with directory"
- PostgreSQL startup failure: "could not access file 'vectors.so'"

The /lib directory is typically a symlink to /usr/lib in modern Linux systems.
Creating /tmp/mod-root/lib caused the overlay to fail and prevented proper
installation of the vectors.so extension file.

All libraries now correctly install to /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu.
